item.title: [RS2][SRL]Simple Power Chopper
item.dc:creator: @hey321 hey321
item.description:
@hey321 wrote:

zdarkmage77:

Very big hint: do not use movemousesmooth! It’s pretty machinelike compared to many other mm functions, instead use movemousespline and movemousecc which are a whole ton better (unless if you wanna get banned)

No offense but I lol’d.

Use Mmouse or Mouse, both are undetectable srl functions (do NOT use movemouse or any default scar ones if they interact in rs) i.e:

MoveMouse
ClickMouse
SendKeys

That type of thing.

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Simple Power Chopper
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Here -

[code]program myfirstscript;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

const
treecolor1=5075056;
treecolor2=2897976;
treecolor3=3825752;
timetowait1=5000;

Procedure findtree;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor1,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor2,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))or
(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor3,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
begin
MMouse(x, y, 3, 3);
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
begin
writeln(“Found a tree.”)
Mouse(x, y, 2, 2, True);
Wait(13);
Exit;
end else
begin
writeln(“No trees were found, did you pick good colors?”)
end;
end;
end;

Procedure antirandoms;
begin
if FindFight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘n’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
RunBack;
end;
FindLamp(‘mining’);
TypeSend(‘this is so boring’);
end;

procedure invcheck;
begin
if InvCount = 28 then
begin
DropTo(2, 28);
end;
end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
SetRun(true);
repeat
MakeCompass(‘n’);
FindNormalRandoms;
findtree;
invcheck;
timetowait1;
until(false);
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2][SRL]Simple Power Chopper
item.dc:creator: @viperzer0 viperzer0
item.description:
@viperzer0 wrote:

[code]program myfirstscript;
{.include srl/srl.scar}
{.include srl/srl/skill/woodcutting.scar}

const
treecolor1=5075056;
treecolor2=2897976;
treecolor3=3825752;
timetowait1=5000;

procedure findtree;
begin
if(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor1,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
movemousesmooth(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
writeln(“Found a tree.”)
HoldMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(13);
ReleaseMouse(x,y,true);
else(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor2,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
movemousesmooth(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
writeln(“Found a tree.”)
HoldMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(7);
ReleaseMouse(x,y,true);
else(findcolorspiraltolerance(x,y,treecolor3,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,25))then
movemousesmooth(x,y,3,3)
if(IsUpTextMulti(‘chop’,‘op do’,‘down’))then
writeln(“Found a tree.”)
HoldMouse(x,y,true);
Wait(9);
ReleaseMouse(x,y,true);
else writeln(“No trees were found, did you pick good colors?”)
end;

procedure antirandoms;
begin
if FindFight then
begin
RunAwayDirection(‘n’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
RunBack;
end;
FindLamp(‘mining’);

TypeSend(‘this is so boring’);

end;

procedure invcheck;
begin
if InventoryFull = true then
DropTo(2, 28);

end;

begin
SetUpSRL;
SetRun(true);
MakeCompass(‘n’);
FindNormalRandoms;
findtree;
invcheck;
timetowait1;
repeat

end;

end.[/code]

post advice, help, comments

my first script don’t be to harsh

Read full topic
